section.heading: Repair or replacement of assistive devices or adaptive equipment provided for employees with disabilities

content.p:
ยง 152. Repair or replacement of assistive devices or adaptive
equipment provided for employees with disabilities. Notwithstanding any
law, regulation or rule to the contrary, any assistive device or
adaptive equipment which has been provided by the state to an employee
with a disability as a reasonable accommodation and which is necessary
to the performance of the duties of the employee's position shall be
repaired or replaced by such state employee's appointing authority in a
timely fashion and at no cost to such employee whenever the assistive
device or adaptive equipment requires repair or replacement.
